casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Karen Elaine EVERETT. No. 350A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Thomas G. Meacham, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Everett) shall have up to and including the 6th day of October 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
